articles.title: Bitcoin in the bush - the crypto mine in remote Zambia
articles.description: Bitcoin miners will go to remote locations to take advantage of cheap electricity.
articles.content:
Joe TidyCyber correspondent, BBC World Service
Engineers from Gridless create makeshift computer labs to maintain their bitcoin mines
The roar of the Zambezi is deafening as millions of gallons of … [+8832 chars]
